Product Title: YsesoAi 28 Pcs Hair Curlers Spiral Curls No Heat Wave Hair Curlers Styling Kit Spiral Hair Curlers Magic Hair Rollers with 2 Pieces Styling Hooks for Most Kinds of Hairstyles (20 cm/ 7.8 inches)

Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Brand': 'YsesoAi', 'Color': 'Pink, Blue, Ivory, Yellow, Green', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '745895771436'}
Review Text: My hair is naturally curly so , I wanted to see how it would do on a blowout.  I like the curly pattern that it creates the only problem I had was my hair was to long for this, pulling your hair threw with the hook that's given was easy. It did not hurt to pull your hair threw the spiral curlers.
Review Title: Short Hair Only

Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces.
Qiray
{'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'}
Very pretty, they have a good stretch depending you your hairstyle you may twist twice.  You get two of each color.  The only thing I did not like is that these hair ties have a paint smell to them so wash them before wearing them.
Good
STYLEAGAL Portable Electric Nail Drill, Manicure Pedicure Drill Kit Professional nail starter kit for beginners acrylic with drill（2020 Upgraded）
styleagal
{'Brand': 'styleagal', 'Voltage': '5 Volts', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 4.5 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '782913461771', 'Manufacturer': 'STYLEAGAL'}
[[VIDEOID:c1d81e3cfad618ed65e971a49ab65264]] This is a nice drill great for beginners.  Just take some practice to get good at using it on your self and others hand.  The power cord is not long enough and the drill bits is hard to push them in and to pull out.  If you have never used a drill start working with the lower speed first.
Works very well
Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Cream Deodorant with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Jasmine)
PRETTY FRANK
{'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Jasmine, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.42 x 2.79 x 2.59 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
I like the fact that its organic and made in the US. However, this is not a deodorant for someone who is on the move. I do have sweaty underarms and I had to clean my armpits and apply this several times a day to be dry.  I don't like that I have to put this on with my fingers.  I was dry long as I wasn't moving around to much and in a cool place.  The jasmine scent is wonderful.  It is a small jar but you get a lot.
Not for me

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Focus**: The user continues to favor hair accessories, specifically versatile and colorful hair ties, and has recently expanded their interest towards styling tools, as indicated by their purchase of a no-heat curling kit. This aligns with their ongoing interest in beauty tools and personal care items, particularly those that enhance hair styling without causing damage.
  
- **Aesthetic Preferences**: The user demonstrates a strong preference for visually appealing products and enjoys lively colors like pink, blue, and green. They appreciate thoughtful design, including how products complement their personal style and contribute to their overall beauty routine.

- **Functionality**: The user emphasizes practicality in their beauty and personal care choices, assessing the effectiveness of products in everyday use. Their positive experience with the curling kit's ease of use highlights this focus on functionality alongside aesthetics.

- **Quality Assessment**: The user exhibits a discerning attitude towards product quality, providing feedback based on hands-on experience. They expect products to deliver excellent performance, particularly in hair care and styling.

- **Sensory Awareness**: The user remains sensitive to product usability and how they fit into an active lifestyle. Favoring products that are easy to apply and use, they maintain a preference for tools that enhance their everyday routines without requiring excessive time or effort.

- **Buying Habit**: The user’s purchasing habits reflect a careful balance of beauty and practicality, with a keen eye for details like usability and effectiveness in personal care products.
